title: Twisted Treeline in OCE only on at specific times.
body:
Hello Riot and Oce players,
I would just like to know why 3v3 is only out at specific times within the Oceania region and not available all the time.
I've heard that it is due to not many people playing it, but whenever i jump in Que it usually finds a game within a minute or so.
I was wondering if twisted treeline would be available constantly soon as it is a very fun game mode that provides a little diversity to playing a game of league with mates.
Thanks, Spartan254

replies.body:
Good to hear that the queue's been good for you! 

The reason Twisted Treeline isn't on all the time is because our server isn't quite big enough yet to support it full time. We review the numbers regularly and if it does get to the point where we can expand the availability window we will announce it on here.
Is that also the same reason it was removed in ranked as well.

It's not due to many people not playing it. It's about not having enough people for other queues to be healthy while it is up.  Currently it's only available when the peak amount of players are on so other queue times are not affected.

It's full time availability is for Riot to look at the numbers and decide what constitutes a healthy queue time.
